summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Plat 66W, page 159 of the Official Land Use Map to rezone property west of 5605 Martin Luther King Jr. Way South, from Single Family 5000 (SF 5000) to Commercial One/40-foot height limit (C1/40') zone and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Gill Centioli, C.F. 298561)
